__inputs.name: DS_PROMETHEUS
__inputs.label: Prometheus
__inputs.description: Prometheus datasource for ParqueDB compaction metrics

description: Monitor ParqueDB compaction system health, throughput, and queue depth

panels.description: Total windows awaiting compaction across all namespaces
panels.title: Windows Pending

panels.description: Windows stuck in processing state (potential issues)
panels.title: Windows Stuck

panels.description: Age of the oldest pending compaction window
panels.title: Oldest Window Age

panels.description: Age of oldest pending window per namespace
panels.title: Oldest Window Age by Namespace

panels.description: Rate of change in pending files (negative = throughput)
panels.title: File Processing Rate (files/min)

panels.description: Total bytes pending compaction over time
panels.title: Bytes Pending by Namespace

panels.description: Byte processing throughput (negative = data being compacted)
panels.title: Byte Processing Throughput

panels.description: Known and active writers over time
panels.title: Writers Over Time

panels.description: Stuck windows indicate potential errors or timeouts
panels.title: Stuck Windows by Namespace

panels.description: Alerting thresholds visualization. Yellow = degraded (2h age, 10 pending), Red = unhealthy (6h age, 50 pending, any stuck)
panels.title: Pending Windows with Thresholds

title: ParqueDB Compaction
